name: HipReplacementSurgery
title: Hip Replacement Surgery
purpose: (Clinical Focus: The purpose of this value set is to represent concepts of procedures for total hip replacement procedures.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use a model element related to Procedure.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes concepts that represent a procedure for a total hip replacement.),(Exclusion Criteria: No exclusions.)
